name: Mount Tai
description: Get to know this 9.2-km point-to-point trail near Tai'an, Shandong. Generally considered a challenging route, it takes an average of 4 h 8 min to complete. This is a very popular area for birding, hiking, and walking, so you'll likely encounter other people while exploring.

name: Mount Tai from Daimiao Temple
description: Try this 17.4-km out-and-back trail near Tai'an, Shandong. Generally considered a challenging route, it takes an average of 7 h 54 min to complete. This is a very popular area for birding, hiking, and walking, so you'll likely encounter other people while exploring.

name: Mount Tai Upper Trail
description: Explore this 16.7-km out-and-back trail near Tai'an, Shandong. Generally considered a challenging route, it takes an average of 9 h 7 min to complete. This is a popular trail for backpacking, camping, and hiking, but you can still enjoy some solitude during quieter times of day.

name: Three Confucius Sites of Qufu
description: Enjoy this 7.6-km point-to-point trail near Jining, Shandong. Generally considered an easy route, it takes an average of 1 h 40 min to complete. This is a popular trail for walking, but you can still enjoy some solitude during quieter times of day.

name: Jinjialing
description: Enjoy this 0.8-km out-and-back trail near Qingdao, Shandong. Generally considered a moderately challenging route, it takes an average of 16 min to complete. This trail is great for hiking and walking, and it's unlikely you'll encounter many other people while exploring.

name: Mengshan Park Loop
description: Check out this 3.5-km loop trail near Linyi Shi, Shandong. Generally considered a moderately challenging route. This trail is great for hiking and walking, and it's unlikely you'll encounter many other people while exploring.
